name: Reindeer Rescue (Chafmere)
description:
'Twas the night before Christmas, when all through Santa's Factory Not a creature was stirring, not even an Elf. The present were packed by the Sleigh and the Elves were snug in their beds. 

Santa was to do one last check on the Reindeer but when he arrived at the stable there was not a deer to be found. Something or Someone has spooked Santa's Reindeer only hours before take off.

Help Santa rescue the Reindeer and Save Christmas.
